@srgiaco @FireConf We don't want to miss out on big name Clubs because the economics don't work based on ST pricing. It was a tough call.
@srgiaco @FireConf The causes a problem because we need ticket revenue to pay appearance fee and expenses of teams to travel.
@srgiaco @FireConf The real problem is that the fees for those teams have gone up dramatically the last 3 years and our ST prices have not.
@srgiaco @FireConf We will continue to host them and will give STHs first crack at purchasing tickets. Working now on options for 2014.
